attributes.action: Petition to save Tesco Kensington Pharmacy At Cromwell Rd, London W14 8PB
attributes.additional_details: Closing of the pharmacy in Tesco Kensington would make a lot of customers disappointed as they shop and get the medicines in one place. Closing down our pharmacy would affect the area and bring down profits Tesco has got with customers and our patients.
attributes.background: Prevent the bosses of Tesco to close down the Tesco Pharmacy.

rejection.details:
We can only accept petitions about things the Government or Parliament are directly responsible for.

Decisions about individual Tesco stores are a matter for Tescos, not the UK Government or Parliament.
